product_description: The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid easily tackles every thirst. With a built-in, easy-clean straw and a wide-mouth opening, the FreeSip reusable bottle is designed for drinking two different ways: sipping upright through the straw or tilting back to swig from the wide-mouth spout opening. Add in a push-to-open lid and playful colors, and staying hydrated has never been simpler—or more fun. Additional features include double-wall insulated stainless steel that keeps drinks cold up to 24 hours, a carry loop that doubles as a lock, a cup holder-friendly base, and a wide opening for easy cleaning and adding ice. The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid is available in three sizes: 24-Ounce, 32-Ounce, and 40-Ounce. Lid is dishwasher safe; hand wash cup. product_description: The ThermoFlask 40 oz Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle is the perfect companion for hydration enthusiasts seeking versatility while on the go. This insulated water bottle features both a chug lid and a straw lid to suit different drinking preferences, making it an ideal choice for various activities. Engineered from premium 18/8 food-grade stainless steel, this high-quality water bottle promises long-lasting performance and reliability. Its leakproof design ensures that the bottle remains spill-free, providing peace of mind when stored in backpacks or gym bags. With its advanced vacuum insulation, this bottle keeps beverages cold for up to 24 hours and hot for 12 hours, making it an essential tool for both hot and cold beverages. Offering easy maintenance, each component of this stainless steel insulated water bottle is dishwasher-safe and straightforward to hand wash, ensuring a fuss-free cleaning experience. The ThermoFlask water bottle is not just another gym water bottle but a durable thermal water bottle that keeps your drink fresh throughout the day. Perfect for adults who want a safe, reusable water bottle for travel, sports, or everyday hydration. Enhance your routine with this versatile and reliable insulated stainless steel water bottle, and experience the difference in your hydration habits.
